trans-unit.source: Windows 10 roaming settings reference | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 roaming settings reference | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A complete list of all the settings that will be roamed or backed up in Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: A complete list of all the settings that will be roamed or backed up in Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: The following is a complete list of all the settings that will be roamed or backed up in Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: The following is a complete list of all the settings that will be roamed or backed up in Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: See the following table for a summary of the devices and account types that are supported by the sync, backup, and restore framework in Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: See the following table for a summary of the devices and account types that are supported by the sync, backup, and restore framework in Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Windows settings generally sync by default, but some settings are only backed up, such as the list of installed applications on a device.
trans-unit.target: Windows settings generally sync by default, but some settings are only backed up, such as the list of installed applications on a device.

trans-unit.source: If a user disables sync on the device using the Settings app, application data that normally syncs becomes backup only.
trans-unit.target: If a user disables sync on the device using the Settings app, application data that normally syncs becomes backup only.

trans-unit.source: Backup data can only be accessed through the restore operation during the first run experience of a new device.
trans-unit.target: Backup data can only be accessed through the restore operation during the first run experience of a new device.

trans-unit.source: Backups can be disabled via the device settings, and can be managed and deleted through the user’s OneDrive account.
trans-unit.target: Backups can be disabled via the device settings, and can be managed and deleted through the user’s OneDrive account.

trans-unit.source: The following settings groups are available for end-users to enable/disable settings sync on Windows 10 devices.
trans-unit.target: The following settings groups are available for end-users to enable/disable settings sync on Windows 10 devices.

trans-unit.source: Theme: desktop background, user tile, taskbar position, etc.
trans-unit.target: Theme: desktop background, user tile, taskbar position, etc.

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer Settings: browsing history, typed URLs, favorites, etc.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer Settings: browsing history, typed URLs, favorites, etc.

trans-unit.source: Language Preferences: spelling dictionary, system language settings
trans-unit.target: Language Preferences: spelling dictionary, system language settings

trans-unit.source: Ease of Access: narrator, on-screen keyboard, magnifier
trans-unit.target: Ease of Access: narrator, on-screen keyboard, magnifier

trans-unit.source: Other Windows Settings: see Windows Settings details
trans-unit.target: Other Windows Settings: see Windows Settings details

trans-unit.source: In the following table, Other entries in the Settings Group column refers to settings that can be disabled by going to Settings > Accounts > Sync your settings > Other Windows settings.
trans-unit.target: In the following table, Other entries in the Settings Group column refers to settings that can be disabled by going to Settings > Accounts > Sync your settings > Other Windows settings.

trans-unit.source: Internal entries in the Settings Group column refer to settings and apps that can only be disabled from syncing within the app itself or by disabling sync for the entire device using mobile device management (MDM) or Group Policy settings.
trans-unit.target: Internal entries in the Settings Group column refer to settings and apps that can only be disabled from syncing within the app itself or by disabling sync for the entire device using mobile device management (MDM) or Group Policy settings.

trans-unit.source: Settings that don't roam or sync will not belong to a group.
trans-unit.target: Settings that don't roam or sync will not belong to a group.

trans-unit.source: **Advanced mobile broadband**: Internet connection sharing network name (enables auto-discovery of mobile Wi-Fi hotspots via Bluetooth)
trans-unit.target: **Advanced mobile broadband**: Internet connection sharing network name (enables auto-discovery of mobile Wi-Fi hotspots via Bluetooth)

trans-unit.source: **App data**: individual apps can sync data
trans-unit.target: **App data**: individual apps can sync data

trans-unit.source: **Cortana**: enable Cortana on the lock screen
trans-unit.target: **Cortana**: enable Cortana on the lock screen

trans-unit.source: **Cortana**: find info on flights and more
trans-unit.target: **Cortana**: find info on flights and more

trans-unit.source: **Date, Time, and Region**: automatic time (Internet time sync)
trans-unit.target: **Date, Time, and Region**: automatic time (Internet time sync)

trans-unit.source: **Date, Time, and Region**: date and time
trans-unit.target: **Date, Time, and Region**: date and time

trans-unit.source: **Date, Time, and Region**: daylight savings time
trans-unit.target: **Date, Time, and Region**: daylight savings time

trans-unit.source: **Date, Time, and Region**: first day of week
trans-unit.target: **Date, Time, and Region**: first day of week

trans-unit.source: **Desktop personalization**: desktop Theme (background, system color, default system sounds, screen saver)
trans-unit.target: **Desktop personalization**: desktop Theme (background, system color, default system sounds, screen saver)

trans-unit.source: **Keyboard**: users can turn on/off on-screen keyboard
trans-unit.target: **Keyboard**: users can turn on/off on-screen keyboard

trans-unit.source: **Keyboard**: turn on sticky yes (off by default)
trans-unit.target: **Keyboard**: turn on sticky yes (off by default)

trans-unit.source: **Keyboard**: turn on filter keys (off by default)
trans-unit.target: **Keyboard**: turn on filter keys (off by default)

trans-unit.source: **Keyboard**: turn on toggle keys (off by default)
trans-unit.target: **Keyboard**: turn on toggle keys (off by default)

trans-unit.source: **Internet Explorer**: domain Language: Chinese (CHS) QWERTY - enable self-learning
trans-unit.target: **Internet Explorer**: domain Language: Chinese (CHS) QWERTY - enable self-learning

trans-unit.source: **Language**: CHS QWERTY - enable dynamic c&idate ranking
trans-unit.target: **Language**: CHS QWERTY - enable dynamic c&idate ranking

trans-unit.source: **Language**: CHS QWERTY - C/E switch key, shift
trans-unit.target: **Language**: CHS QWERTY - C/E switch key, shift

trans-unit.source: **Language**: CHS QWERTY - C/E switch key, Ctrl
trans-unit.target: **Language**: CHS QWERTY - C/E switch key, Ctrl

trans-unit.source: **Language**: CHS WUBI - single character input mode
trans-unit.target: **Language**: CHS WUBI - single character input mode

trans-unit.source: **Language**: CHS WUBI - show the remaining coding of the c&idate
trans-unit.target: **Language**: CHS WUBI - show the remaining coding of the c&idate

trans-unit.source: **Language**: CHS WUBI - beep when 4-coding is invalid
trans-unit.target: **Language**: CHS WUBI - beep when 4-coding is invalid

trans-unit.source: **Language**: Japanese IME - predictive typing and custom words
trans-unit.target: **Language**: Japanese IME - predictive typing and custom words

trans-unit.source: **Magnifier**: turn inversion color on or off (off by default)
trans-unit.target: **Magnifier**: turn inversion color on or off (off by default)

trans-unit.source: **Magnifier**: start when users sign in (off by default)
trans-unit.target: **Magnifier**: start when users sign in (off by default)

trans-unit.source: **Mouse**: change the size of mouse cursor
trans-unit.target: **Mouse**: change the size of mouse cursor

trans-unit.source: **Mouse**: change the color of mouse cursor
trans-unit.target: **Mouse**: change the color of mouse cursor

trans-unit.source: **Narrator**: users can change Narrator speaking pitch
trans-unit.target: **Narrator**: users can change Narrator speaking pitch

trans-unit.source: **Narrator**: users can turn on or off Narrator reading hints for common items (on by default)
trans-unit.target: **Narrator**: users can turn on or off Narrator reading hints for common items (on by default)

trans-unit.source: **Narrator**: users can turn on or off whether they can hear typed characters (on by default)
trans-unit.target: **Narrator**: users can turn on or off whether they can hear typed characters (on by default)

trans-unit.source: **Narrator**: users can turn on or off whether they can hear typed words (on by default)
trans-unit.target: **Narrator**: users can turn on or off whether they can hear typed words (on by default)

trans-unit.source: **Narrator**: have insert cursor following Narrator (on by default)
trans-unit.target: **Narrator**: have insert cursor following Narrator (on by default)

trans-unit.source: **Narrator**: enable visual highlighting of Narrator cursor (on by default)
trans-unit.target: **Narrator**: enable visual highlighting of Narrator cursor (on by default)

trans-unit.source: **Narrator**: activate keys on the touch keyboard when you lift your finger (off by default)
trans-unit.target: **Narrator**: activate keys on the touch keyboard when you lift your finger (off by default)

trans-unit.source: **Ease of access**: set the thickness of the blinking cursor
trans-unit.target: **Ease of access**: set the thickness of the blinking cursor

trans-unit.source: **Ease of access**: remove background images (off by default)
trans-unit.target: **Ease of access**: remove background images (off by default)

trans-unit.source: **Typing**: show text suggestions as I type
trans-unit.target: **Typing**: show text suggestions as I type

trans-unit.source: **Typing**: add a space after I choose a text suggestion
trans-unit.target: **Typing**: add a space after I choose a text suggestion

trans-unit.source: **Typing**: add a period after I double-tap the spacebar
trans-unit.target: **Typing**: add a period after I double-tap the spacebar

trans-unit.source: **Typing**: capitalize the first letter of each sentence
trans-unit.target: **Typing**: capitalize the first letter of each sentence

trans-unit.source: **Typing**: use all uppercase letters when I double-tap shift key
trans-unit.target: **Typing**: use all uppercase letters when I double-tap shift key

trans-unit.source: **Typing**: play key sounds as I type
trans-unit.target: **Typing**: play key sounds as I type

trans-unit.source: Enable enterprise state roaming in Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Enable enterprise state roaming in Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: Group policy and MDM settings for settings sync
trans-unit.target: Group policy and MDM settings for settings sync
